goal: Build a REST API with authentication, CRUD endpoints, and tests

steps.task: Create a Node.js/Express REST API with: (1) User authentication endpoints (register, login, logout) using JWT, (2) CRUD endpoints for the main resource, (3) Input validation and error handling, (4) CORS configuration. Use TypeScript if the project supports it.

Write comprehensive tests for the REST API: (1) Unit tests for auth middleware, (2) Integration tests for all endpoints using supertest, (3) Edge case tests (invalid input, unauthorized access, missing fields). Ensure all tests pass.

Set up CI/CD and deployment config: (1) GitHub Actions workflow for lint + test on PR, (2) Dockerfile for containerized deployment, (3) Environment variable configuration (.env.example). Do not modify application code.

Final integration: (1) Verify all endpoints work end-to-end, (2) Ensure README documents all API endpoints with example requests, (3) Verify CI workflow syntax is valid, (4) Fix any integration issues between components.
